name: Ethereal Drake
description: The Ethereal Drake is a large dragon capable of traversing both the Material and Ethereal Planes, featuring a chaotic neutral alignment and a striking presence. It appears formidable with its natural armor and high hit points.
memorable: Known for its ability to manipulate battlefield positioning by shifting opponents to the Ethereal Plane.
goals: To dominate combat by utilizing its unique ethereal abilities to confuse and overpower opponents.
relations: Related to other dragon species, might serve or be served by beings associated with the Ethereal Plane.
environment: Often found in areas where the Material and Ethereal Planes intersect or near locations of significant ethereal energy.
strengths: Possesses ethereal movement and can deal significant damage while grappling foes.
weaknesses: Lower Intelligence and Charisma, indicating less social or magical aptitude than other dragons.
attacks: Multiattack including a Bite for piercing plus force damage, and Claws for slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Phase Breath, allowing it to deal force damage and shift creatures to the Ethereal Plane.
senses: Has Ethereal Sight, enabling it to see into the Ethereal Plane up to 60 feet.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to notice details in its environment effectively.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions.
Resistant to cold and necrotic damage.
Can shift creatures it grapples to the Ethereal Plane.
Has a passive perception score of 15, showcasing its awareness.
Can magically shift between planes as a bonus action.
test_queries: chaotic dragon shifting foes to ethereal plane
dragon with powerful bite and claw attacks
elusive dragon capable of flying and grappling
ethereal creature with unique battlefield manipulation
